name: @vtmn/assets
description: Decathlon Design System - Vitamin assets library

scripts.build: yarn build:svg && yarn build:json && yarn build:sprite
scripts.build:sprite: shx rm -rf ./dist/assets/sprite && shx mkdir ./dist/assets/sprite && spritesh -i dist/assets/svg -o dist/assets/sprite/assets.svg && svgo dist/assets/sprite/assets.svg -o dist/assets/sprite/assets.svg --config ./svgo-sprite.config.js && node src/scripts/add-sprite-declaration.js
